body.description: Neutrogena make-up remover cleansing Towelettes. Ultra soft cloths gently dissolve all traces of makeup even waterproof mascara. 7 pre-moistened towelettes. 7.4" X 7.2" (19 x 18.5 Cm).

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #1,449 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #5 in Makeup Cleansing Wipes

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Directions: Gently wipe face with towelette, removing dirt and all traces of face and eye makeup. There is no need to rinse. Dispose of the towelette in trash receptacle (do not flush). After removing towelette, reseal refill pack. If stored in vanity case, secure lid. Makeup Remover Cleansing Towelettes #1 Best Selling Makeup Remover* Makeup Remover Cleansing Towelettes effectively dissolve all traces of dirt, oil and makeup--even waterproof mascara--for clean, fresh skin in one easy step. These gentle, ultra-soft cloths contain superior cleansing technology so effective it removes even waterproof mascara. With one step, it leaves skin clean with no heavy residue, so there's no need to rinse. And it's gentle enough to use around the sensitive eye area, even for contact lens wearers. Make your skin make-up free the easy way.

Effective Clinically proven to remove 99.3% of your most stubborn makeup, even waterproof mascara. Gentle Our formula is as gentle as water to the eyes. Quick & Easy With one step, our makeup removers leave skin thoroughly clean with no heavy residue, so there's no need to rinse.

About Neutrogena Brand Neutrogena is a brand of Johnson & Johnson Consumer Inc. The #1 dermatologist-recommended** skincare brand, Neutrogena offers some of the world's most loved beauty and skin care lines, and manufactures and markets products in over 70 countries. *Based on Nielsen mass market November YTD 2015 data. **Neutrogena is the #1 OTC brand recommended by Dermatologists in the USA. (Source: Dermatologist Recommendation Study. Gfk. 2016)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Make remover wipes
reviews.reviewText: The package size is perfect for traveling or using in your purse.The wipes gently remove makeup without irritating my eyes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these for removing eye make-up
reviews.reviewText: I’ve tried many options for eye makeup removers. These work GREAT. They clean the eyes gently, no irritation when they come in contact with your eyeballs. Which is a huge plus when dealing with eyeballs! Excellent product, scent is nice too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: these are my fav makeup wipes ever i always get these makeup wipes whenever i see them. they work so well and can easily take off waterproof mascara

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for Travel
reviews.reviewText: These small packages are good to take on trips. They're easy to pack and exactly what's needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great "Go To" Make-up Wipes
reviews.reviewText: I use these for travel. They are easy to use and remove make-up very well. I also put them in the bathroom for when we have guests. They can sting if you have sensitive skin, which is why I only rated 4-stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was surprised at how thick and soft these are. They didn't make my skin feel raw afterwards. Gets my eye makeup off in a hurry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works very well on mascaraGood for face

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Oldie but goodie!
reviews.reviewText: I've been using these wipes for more than 20 years and it is still my go to and brand of makeup remover wipes I reach for despite having tried every wipe and makeup remover under the sun. Cleans skin well, takes off eyemakeup without having to scrub your eyes raw, I have regular skin not necessarily sensitive but not overly tough skin and I have never experienced a rash, redness, or adverse reaction in the 20 years I've been using them. Love the full size packs for home and the travel size for on the go. Both of my Daughters 12 & 22 use them and neither have ever had a reaction. Convenient, reliable staple!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Paid nearly ten pounds for half a dozen tiny wipes ! Total rip off !!!!!!!
